text:
Walter Jonathan "Walt" Dohrn (born 1970) is an American writer, director, artist, actor, animator, musician, screenwriter, and voice artist. He is best known as the voice of Rumpelstiltskin in "Shrek Forever After". He also did additional voices in "Shrek the Third" and was also the voice of Doodlebob in the "SpongeBob SquarePants" episode "Frankendoodle."
Dohrn has also worked as writer and director of Season 2 of "SpongeBob SquarePants".
